content.label: High Latency Mode
content.doc: Enable for unstable networks. Increases buffer to 32 MB and adds 2 second metadata delay.

content.label: Additional Metadata Delay (ms)
content.doc: Extra delay before displaying metadata. Usually 0 is fine.

sections.label: About
sections.description: Mother Earth Radio Plugin v1.4 - SSE real-time metadata. Three qualities: FLAC 192kHz, FLAC 96kHZ, AAC 96kHz. Higher Network Buffer if needed.
